title: CoreSpring Select Evidence in Text Schema

componentType.description: A required value to indicate the component type. For select text, this must be 'corespring-select-text'.

correctResponse.description: An array of choice indexes representing the correct response for the interaction.

feedback.description: Describes feedback which should be presented to the user when the component is submitted.

correctFeedback.description: A feedback string that will be shown for a correct response if correctFeedbackType is set to 'custom'.

correctFeedbackType.description: Describes the type of feedback that will be shown if all of the correct choices are entered.

incorrectFeedback.description: A feedback string that will be shown for a incorrect response if incorrectFeedbackType is set to 'custom'.

incorrectFeedbackType.description: Describes the type of feedback that will be shown if no correct choices are entered.

partialFeedback.description: A feedback string that will be shown for a partially correct response if partialFeedbackType is set to 'custom'.

partialFeedbackType.description: Describes the type of feedback that will be shown if some of the correct choices are entered.

model.description: Contains configuration and select text params.

data.description: The tokenized text that represents a correct answer.

config.description: Configuration for rendering select text evidence.

availability.description: A value indicating the availability of selections in the passage (all available or specific selection)

selectionUnit.description: A value indicating the selection unit in the passage

xhtml.description: A value that represents the HTML of the text passage

partialScoring.description: A description of the partial scoring to be used by the interaction.

items.description: A configuration object which maps the number of correct responses to the percentage to be awarded.

scorePercentage.description: The percentage of the score to be awarded for the number of correct responses.

title.description: A title for the interaction, displayed in the editor.

weight.description: The weighting to be assigned to the interaction in the context of the overall item.
